4302860.name: Renascor
4302860.description:
RENASCOR 

The fabric of time has been torn, and the Breath of God has scattered across the universe. Are you ready to stop a divine curse lurking in the shadows of the past?

RENASCOR, is a story-driven psychological horror and investigation game playable with 1–4 players. As members of Renascor, a time-travel organization, you will journey into the darkest moments of history and the heart of mythological horrors to collect the fragments of Flatus Dei (the Breath of God), which holds the universe’s shattered reality together. 

STORY: THE ARCHITECT’S SLEEP AND THE BEGINNING OF THE FALL

At the dawn of the universe, the Architect King extracted Flatus Dei, the trembling heart of existence. But the arrogance of the Prince, heir to the throne, and the betrayal of the Nine Leaders shattered the spine of time itself. This divine breath fractured into thousands of pieces, scattering across the layers of history. Each fragment now corrupts any living being it touches, giving birth to legends and grotesque creatures.

Your mission is to use legends as a compass, track down these fragments, and reunite them before time collapses beyond repair. 

CORE FEATURES 

  • Class-Based Cooperation: Build a strategic team from four distinct classes, each with unique passive abilities and equipment: Investigator, Medic, Biologist, and Support. Coordination is the only path to survival.

  • Realistic Investigation Mechanics: You are not just a hunter, but a scientist. Gather evidence with spectral cameras, collect samples using DNA kits, and track traces of Flatus Dei with radiation meters.

  • Time and Space Paradoxes: The regions you enter are caught in temporal distortion. Navigate looping corridors, statues that move when unobserved, and confront echoes of your own past selves.

  • Equipment and Resource Management: Your flashlight battery may die at any moment, and radio communication can fail within anomaly zones. Manage equipment degradation and your psychological strain (Sanity meter), or hallucinations will overtake your perception of reality.

Universal Anomalies and Divine Deformations

  • Echoes of a Godly Curse: Legends from around the world are far darker than they appear; myths and divine beings are the result of radioactive distortions caused by Flatus Dei.

  • Distorted Reality: Survive in a world where ordinary creatures twist into horrifying forms, and mortals touched by the divine breath ascend into monstrous godhood.

  • Dynamic Threat Pool: Face a wide spectrum of anomalies, each with unique mechanics: whispers that mimic your teammates’ voices, entities that feed on the flesh of the fallen and disrupt the flow of time, and far worse.

  • Let Legends Be Your Compass: Use folk tales, oracle notes, and battle records as tracking tools, because every supernatural event marks the location of a fragment torn from the heart of time.

  • Dynamic Mechanics: Every encounter is not just a fight for survival, but a complex investigation requiring visual evidence collection and DNA sample analysis.

MISSION FLOW: INVESTIGATE, COLLECT, ESCAPE!

Every operation begins at the underground, high-tech Organization Base. Set the destination on the time machine and step beyond the portal.

  • Collect Evidence: Confirm the anomaly’s existence through photos, videos, and audio recordings.

  • Take Samples: Secure DNA and environmental samples in containment units.

  • Record the Anomaly: Seal time and light distortions using the Chrono-Scanner.

  • Escape: Once the core sample is acquired, the hunt begins. Return to the extraction point before the time portal collapses.

TECHNICAL DETAILS AND ATMOSPHERE

Renascor is designed to keep players in a constant state of unease. With its advanced audio engine, whispers and distant clawing sounds will crawl under your skin. Each chapter introduces unique mechanics such as frozen vision, toxic zones, and communication blackouts, forcing players to adapt new strategies every time.

The question is this:

Will you restrain time and reclaim control over the universe, or be consumed by darkness alongside the final breath of Flatus Dei?

                                                                                             

Some doors were never meant to be opened.

But someone always tries.

*具有完全音频支持的语言
